column1:
share on x ts teresa saxonjun 11 at 2:30 pm i would just like to say i remember timmy growing up he lived next door to us on hammerlin ave. all of us kids played together we used to make forts on the side of my mom and dads house we would even have haunted houses, it was very fun memories. then we all grew up parted ways and i haven't seen timmy in years, he will surely be missed until we meet again. my prayers all go out to his family! :pray:??:cry::sparkling_heart::heartbeat::heartpulse::two_hearts:comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jl jessica lyon. jun 11 at 2:08 pm uncle timmy, i know you were with us last night. i felt you there. and i was sure it was you when you sent timmy the tow truck driver to get our car (nice one ;) at that moment, my heart skipped a beat and i teared up because i knew without a doubt it was you making sure we made it back home to fl safely. my heart hurts because you're gone... even though i know you are at peace. i'm still trying to wrap my head around why god took you home so soon. i hope you know how much i loved you and how much you meant to me. you always made me smile. you always made me laugh. you were the uncle who was more like the fun older brother... and i cherish the memories i have of you. give papa, marie and grandma a huge hug and kiss from me. stay with us always. i love you uncle timmy john :heart:comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jp jenny porter. jun 11 at 2:03 pm im so sorry for your loss you are in my prayers tjcomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x kelly jones-walljun 11 at 12:38 pm so sorry for your loss. i'm sure your dad was proud of each and every one of you kids, he knew you loved him unconditionally and that is the greatest gift anyone can receive . may he rest in peace. love you guys, chris, kelly and matthew wall. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... celebration of life. jun 13. 3:00 pm - 6:00 pm eastside baptist church1900 conway gardens road. orlando, fl, us, 32806. get order flowers now for john's celebration of life wall a community funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for john's celebration of life show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of john timothy "timmy john" jones send comfort to the jones family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! pat auman. jun 11 at 3:44 pm i first met tim when he came down to our house to hang out with all my children and their friends. he was always making them laugh. there was never a dull moment when he was around. he will be missed. 2 comments share comment share facebook twitter 
john timothy "timmy john" jones| home obituaries flowers & gifts grief & healing plan ahead resources about contact a community funeral home
